items.content_html: A simple BMI Calculator using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users input weight and height to calculate BMI, which is shown in a popup modal with personalized health advice. Lightweight, interactive, and ideal for daily use or integration into health and fitness websites.
items.title: goutamdev/bmi-calculator-: A simple BMI Calculator using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users input weight and height to calculate BMI, which is shown in a popup modal with personalized health advice. Lightweight, interactive, and ideal for daily use or integration into health and fitness websites.

items.content_html: A lightweight data ingestion system for Google Sheets. This project includes a RESTful API and a Google Apps Script backend that supports CSV and JSON data formats, with configurable operations like replace and append. Ideal for automating structured data uploads into Google Sheets via HTTP POST.
items.title: arsabolsky/Data-Barn-Ingest: A lightweight data ingestion system for Google Sheets. This project includes a RESTful API and a Google Apps Script backend that supports CSV and JSON data formats, with configurable operations like replace and append. Ideal for automating structured data uploads into Google Sheets via HTTP POST.

items.content_html: EasyTracker ‚Äì Smart Time Tracking & Project Management for Freelancers A lightweight and intuitive web app for tracking work sessions, managing clients and projects, setting custom tags, receiving smart reminders (including SMS), and generating detailed reports. Integrates with Google Calendar and invoicing platforms to streamline your workflow.
